The captions of the posts: written in both simplified and traditional Chinese, describe the sheep as donated by Mongolia to China during the coronavirus epidemic.
Mongolian President Khaltmaa Battulga pu: 000 sheep to China during a visit to Beijing on February 27, 2020, as reported by AFP.
The Chinese Communist Party: s Central Political and Legal Affairs Commission refuted the claim as "fake" on Weibo, stating that the sheep transfer had not yet begun at the time the misleading posts were published.
